Description:
Build your Dream Home on 567 m2 !!
Titled, Ready to build your dream home on a MASSIVE 567m2 flat land. Situated in the popular Aston Estate, you have the ability to bigger a large home without compromising on space and location.
This parcel of land is close by the Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic and Leisure Centre, Public transport, and abundance of schools both private and public, beautiful parklands and walking tracks. This very ideal location will surely make you the envy of all your friends.
Call now to enquire, This One will not Hang Around For long!
First Home Owner may be eligible for up to $35K Grant!
Train Station: Approx 5KMS
Craigieburn Central approximately 3KMs
Airport approximately 15mins Drive
City Approximately 30mins Drive
Richie Kashyap 0476 647 666
Nikhil Pradhan 0430 532 959

Description:
Ultimate Class and Exceptional Home in Aston !!!
Ultimate Class and Exceptional Home in Aston !!!
Experience the absolute best in family living with this impressive residence. This marvellous modern retreat has an abundance of natural light and room for a growing family, which is matched by a wonderful location. Standing bold and proud this stunning family home is impressive at every angle and just waiting for the lucky new buyer to continue its traditions.
Bathed in natural light, the home's interior showcases stunning raised ceiling of 3650 mm over the kitchen/lounge/dining area. Kitchen with 650 mm high Glass Splashback and Caesarstone 40mm benchtops for kitchen, Chef mixer Chrome and black taps, Butler's Pantry and a Dishwasher Also featuring; master bedroom with walk in robes and a full ensuite with shower and double vanity, other 3 bedrooms with built in robes and two separate living zones. Other highlights include high ceiling of 2700 mm, additional highlighting windows with flush sliding doors to add extra light giving the home that elegate look which is very rare, Upgraded carpets in bedrooms, two separate zoning for ducted heating , 20mm Caesarstone benchtops in bathroom and ensuites with frosted glass windows, landscaped gardens as well as remote-control double garage with internal entry, outside is open backyard, perfect for any family occasion with enough space for your kids and pets to run around & so much more.
Conveniently located within walking distance to public transport, child care facilities, Champion Parade park, Soccer fields, Craigieburn South Secondary School, Aitken Hill Primary School which is now open and just a short walk from Aston. Aston is located in Craigieburn, just 32 kilometres north of the Melbourne CBD and is only 16 kilometres from Melbourne Airport. Easy commute to Melbourne's CBD via the Hume Highway and Tullamarine Freeway These are just more features that will make your future brighter at Aston.
Be quick to contact Gordon on 0433 897 397 to secure this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
BEST ON SHOW!
In a thriving Craigieburn neighborhood, this brand new home is one that will ignite your excitement. Fabulous decor, a charming colour palette & functional floor plan complements an attractive facade & manicured low-maintenance gardens.
Designed for easy living this high quality, low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight the most fastidious homebuyer or investor.
It's smartly configured floor plan comprises a fully equipped stone top kitchen that adjoins spacious open plan meals area which effortlessly links outside to reveal a low maintenance sunny courtyard, fully concreted for convenience. Sleeping quarters including 3 good sized bedrooms all with fitted mirrored robes, huge master with walk-in robe & deluxe dual vanity ensuite, sparkling central bathroom with freestanding tub & separate toilet/powder room.
Further features include a family sized laundry, a double garage with internal access, ducted heating, powerful split-system cooling, high ceilings & doors & so much more!
Whether you're looking for your first home, downsizing or a solid investment opportunity, you simply cannot afford to miss this one!

Description:
A Mt Ridley Family Showpiece on Approx 778sqm
An outstanding opportunity to secure your future awaits with this stunning single-level dwelling. Be entranced as you enter this ambient family home and surprised by the thoughtful and highly flexible floorplan with an exhaustive list of features set amongst large private tropical gardens.
Free-flowing and eminently versatile, the home's light-filled interior boasts a spacious master bedroom with large WIR and stylish ensuite with double shower, plus 3 additional bedrooms, main family bathroom and separate powder room.
Enhancing its fine family credentials is a dedicated study/home office (optional 5th bedroom), spacious front lounge and simply enormous open-plan living/dining area complete with home theatre system and double-flued gas-log fireplace.
Add to this a beautifully-appointed kitchen with stone benchtops/island breakfast bar, soft-close drawers, Insinkerator, dishwasher, 900mm cooking appliances and an abundance of cupboard space.
Hydronic heating and ducted evaporative cooling provide all-seasons comfort, along with the added appeal of a comprehensive security system (alarm, CCTV and video intercom), 5kW Bosch solar power, ducted vacuum, high ceilings and solid hardwood floors, large laundry, excellent storage options, Solar Flex insulating glass and hypo-allergenic paintwork throughout.
Step outside to a northerly aspect al-fresco entertainers dream offering ample play space for the kids, irrigated gardens, built in BBQ and fridge, veggie garden, fire pit area, plus an oversized double garage offering drive through rear access entry to a large garage/workshop perfect for van or boat.
Positioned perfectly in the Mt Ridley neighborhood, this property is walking distance to bus services, easy access to Hume highway and train station, private and public schools, shopping centre, parks and community facilities.

Description:
Brand New Living with Family Credentials
With its natural tones and modern color palette this sparkling brand new Porter Davis built family home will be sure to excite all who inspect it. Simply turn the key & move straight in knowing you have the peace of mind that everything has been done for you.
With its family-friendly free-flowing floor plan, this home comprises of 4 bedrooms, ensuite with double vanities & 2 x walk-in robe to main, fully equipped kitchen with a large walk-in pantry overlooks a spacious open plan living with family & dining room, plus the added bonus of a rumpus room, modern central bathroom, double remote garage with internal access & landscaped front & rear yard on a large 392m2 allotment.
Featuring full turn-key inclusions & premium upgrades, including, roller blinds, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone benchtops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED downlights to entry & living areas, alarm, letterbox, clothesline, fencing & much more.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by.

Description:
LIVE IN THE LAP OF LUXURY !!
Once in a lifetime opportunity.
Built on (30sqm built area) Picture this, an immaculately designed and presented 4 bedroom home boasting nothing but elegance and luxury. Located in the ever sought after location on Highlander Drive. In addition, this property brings a great blend of style, luxury, and elegance.
Ample living areas with a separate retreat upstairs and a study upon grand entrance, all generous in size which makes this magnificent home perfect for entertaining guests. Large master bedroom that boasts gorgeous views, deluxe ensuite and walk-in robe- as well as 3 additional bedrooms, one bedroom with a BIR and the other two with WIRs.
The most luxurious hostess kitchen comes equipped with a waterfall stone benchtop and a generous size Walk-in Pantry. The elegant kitchen overlooks to a generous size meals area and living space, add to that your very own alfresco to entertain family and friends all year round with a low maintenance rear yard.
Architectural refinement and the finest craftsmanship brings new magnificence to this truly prestigious family residence.
Every element is infused with the utmost quality to create a fine blend of form and function.
Generous indeed, this property other features also includes:
High square-set ceilings throughout, the home also includes Electric Motor GATE (Home entrance), ducted heating & evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm & video intercom, family-sized laundry, excellent storage spaces & stone benchtops throughout, plus a covered al-fresco, large backyard & remote-control double garage with internal entry & drive-through option.
Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away. Set in a beautiful street with the friendliest of neighbours is this much loved and cared for home.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
A little gem in a prime location.
If you're looking for that first home or simply adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the one for you. Situated right in the heart of Craigieburn, close to schools, public transport, walking tracks, parklands, wetlands, Craigieburn Central, and Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre its location is second to none. The home comprises of 2 large bedrooms upstairs, as well as the main bathroom. Downstairs you will find a separate roomy living area and /kitchen/meals area with a well-appointed kitchen offering stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops, and dishwasher. Step outside and you will find a fantastic, low maintenance backyard, complete with rear access car accommodation. Other features include split system heating/cooling and much much more. This property will not disappoint, an inspection is a must!

Description:
Beautifully Presented In A Great Location
Nestled in a quiet family-friendly location this home is sure to impress! Immaculately presented, the home's free-flowing interior showcases a bulkhead feature-style entrance, master bedroom with walk-in-robe and modern ensuite, large main bathroom, full sized laundry, open-plan meals area and adjoining gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, plus the added convenience of a light-filled rear family room which effortlessly links to a large outdoor entertaining space providing great privacy for social gatherings.
Further features include ducted heating, cooling, alarm, CCTV system, roller shutters, ceiling fans, remote double garage with both internal & drive-thru access, landscaped garden, great neighbours and so much more!
Perfectly located within minutes to a range of lifestyle attractions including Malcolm Creek trails, local shops, Mt Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, child care facilities, public transport, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre and Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre.
Just move in and enjoy the comforts that this home has to offer. Call now for a private inspection!

Description:
Close Knit Family Home in a Premium Location
Sahil Kakar & "The Eleet Wyndham City" are proud to present 1A Spring Valley Av, Craigieburn,built on a generous land allotment of 338 Sqm, this home offers ease and convenience & is the perfect start for any first home buyer or investor.
Boasting quality fittings throughout and a splendid presentation is this young and vibrant home situated in most sought out location within close proximity to all convenience and amenity.Featuring three spacious fitted bedrooms, including master with double built in robes & other 2 capacious rooms fitted with BIR's. Living Zones consist of a formal Lounge upon entry, a beautiful open plan containing family and meals area.
The central hub of the home consists of a fine example of a gourmet kitchen with a step in pantry and quality cabinetry , abundance of bench & cupboard space, 600 MM cooking and upgraded Cooking appliances.
Other great features include:
** High ceilings
** Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
** Remote garage with wide driveway & a rear access
** Size-able laundry with storage
** Linen Cupboards for additional space
This home not only provides a great ambiance indoors but also outdoors with an enjoyable undercover area suitable for summers and winters plus a backyard for friends & families to enjoy around the year.
This house is all about location as it is within a close proximity to schools, childcare's, Craigieburn train station, Craigieburn plaza, Craigieburn Central, Hume Highway & to top it all it's surrounded by all eateries one can think off.
Don't wait and call Sahil kakar on 0401 926 466 to arrange an inspection.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
Aspirational Family Living with Parkland Perfection
Enviably positioned along one of Craigieburn's premier tree-lined boulevards with acres of lush parkland across the road, this contemporary showpiece delivers a family lifestyle beyond compare with its floorplan versatility, impressive inclusions and approximately 832 square metres of landscaped surrounds.
Well-proportioned rooms and an abundance of natural light create a warm and inviting interior comprising an extra-large master bedroom/retreat with fitted WIR and spa ensuite, together with 3 additional bedrooms (all large with BIRs), stylish main bathroom and guest powder room (W/C).
Further highlighting its impressive family credentials is a dedicated home office, elegant lounge and formal dining room, vast upstairs rumpus with leafy outlook and expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a superb stone-bench kitchen complete with soft-close cabinetry, butler's pantry, dishwasher, gas cooktop and pyrolytic oven.
Premium carpets and engineered timber flooring, zoned ducted heating and refrigerated cooling all add to the appeal, along with a gas-log fireplace (lounge), plantation shutters, alarm system and remote-control roller shutters, family-sized laundry and exceptional storage options.
Step outside to discover a huge al-fresco style entertaining area with extensive decking and large yet wonderfully private backyard garden, plus the advantage of a remote-control double garage with drive-through option (two additional undercover parking spaces).
Endless Malcolm Creek trails virtually at your doorstep, it's also close to public transport (buses on Creekwood Drive), popular primary and secondary schools, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, as well as easy access to the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Architectural Brilliance with Next-Level Luxury
With its intelligent design, first-class features throughout & established gardens all-round, this custom-built single-level showpiece delivers the ultimate modern family lifestyle of luxury & versatility.
Meticulous attention to detail, the home's remarkable interior showcases a grand entrance foyer with towering bulkhead ceiling, 4 large bedrooms (all with fitted robes) complemented by 2 luxurious ensuites and equally-stylish main bathroom - all with premium fittings, double showers & floor-to-ceiling tiles.
Formal & informal living zones include a versatile lounge, separate rumpus/retreat (potential
fifth bedroom) & light-filled open family/dining area accompanied by a gourmet kitchen complete with waterfall island benchtop, quality cooking appliances, integrated Liebherr
fridge/freezer, ample cupboard space & extra-large butler's pantry with dishwasher & double
sink.
Other highlights of this extraordinary home include zoned ducted heating & refrigerated
cooling, a comprehensive security system (alarm, CCTV & video intercom), internal & external sensor lighting, plantation shutters, floor-to-ceiling bedroom curtains, large laundry & excellent storage options, plus stone benchtops, soft-close cabinetry & high square-set
ceilings throughout.
Double sliding doors reveal a paved al-fresco entertaining area overlooking the wonderfully wide backyard garden, as well as the added appeal of a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to the new Mt Aitken Community Centre & Mt Aitken Primary School, it also
offers easy access to the best of Craigieburn including a choice of shopping centres, sports
facilities, endless trails & acres of parkland, as well as public transport & major arterial
roads.
Please Note: Inspections by appointment only

Description:
Walk to the Club House
Private inspections available - The best part about Mandalay is being able to use the facilities provided such as the swimming pool, gymnasium, restaurant and of course the award winning golf course. But how often will you use these facilities when you live so far away from them? Obviously it stands to reason that the more convenient they are, the more likely you will us them; that's why this great home is set above most others in the estate on location. You are a leisurely stroll away from a round of golf, dinner with friends and your morning workout, but location is only a part of the home buying puzzle and there is far more to attract you to this home than just its address. With a large backyard with plenty of side access (enough to fit a boat, car, caravan or all of the above), the pets and kids will have room to move.
Internally the large living space is terrific but for those moments you want to be by yourself, a second living area at the front of the home may be more your cup of tea. With other creature comforts such as gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings and internal access from the garage, this could well be the home (and location) you have been searching for.

Description:
Stylish Townhouse Living
If you are in search for your first home, and would like to save on stamp duty, this is your opportunity to purchase this stylish townhouse. Located in Merrifield Estate's highest point and set opposite the fully developed Hilltop Park, with a short drive to Donnybrook station and Hume Freeway, and only 35 minutes commute to the CBD.
This lovely townhouse offers a modern and a carefree living in a tranquil surroundings. Comprising of 3 modern and carpeted bedrooms on the first floor, master with walk in robe and a good size en-suite with a park view private balcony. You will be waking up to and be greeted with serene mountain view from both rear bedrooms. Marvelous central bathroom with a Bath Tub, floor to ceiling porcelain tiles for easy maintenance and a touch of luxury.
Comfortable living area, a modern stone bench top kitchen and soft close cupboard drawers, ample storage space, dishwasher, and stainless steel appliances. Implementing high end and quality standard throughout with additional highlights as follows;-
. Down-light's
. Blinds
. Square Box Finish Ceiling
. Quality Porcelain Tiles
. Timber Laminate Flooring
. Timber Staircases
. Quality Carpet flooring
. Letter Box, Clothes Line
. Heating and Cooling
With a potential rental return of $390pw
For a VIP access please call us on 9466 3075
Images For Illustrative Purposes
Enquire today before you miss out on this great opportunity.

Description:
BRAND NEW Single-Level Sensation with Versatile Style
An environment of quality and flexibility that's ready to simply move in and enjoy, this
Brand new freestanding (Henley Built) family residence is sure to make a lasting impression with its intelligent floor plan, a long list of features and wonderful NO maintenance garden surrounds. Bathed in natural light, the home's free-flowing interior showcases 4 bedrooms (large master with WIR) along with a stylish ensuite and equally-impressive main bathroom - both with stone-top vanities.
Adding to its family credentials are its dual living spaces, including an expansive open-plan living/dining area and quality stone-bench kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher and large pantry and a second separate living/teen domain.
Along with ducted heating throughout, 2x powerful split system coolers, this outstanding home also includes efficient LED lighting, family-sized laundry and internally-assessed double garage (r/c), plus a delightful al-fresco entertaining area and sizable backyard.
Balmain Road buses at the end of the street and walking distance to Pinnacle Park, it also offers easy access to the Hume Freeway and Donnybrook Station, as well as close proximity to Merrifield's future masterplan amenities which will include sports facilities, retail/dining precincts and schools.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Easy Living with Quality & Style
This perfectly located modern home is guaranteed to impress with its generous design, impeccable presentation and long list of features.
Its smartly configured floor plan boasts easy living, as this low maintenance residence showcases comfort and style that will delight all home buyers and investors alike! From its attractive facade this home comprises 3 bedrooms (master with WIR and ENS), central kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals area, spacious sun-filled family room, central bathroom, landscaped gardens & double garage. Add to this heating, cooling, skylight, and ample storage. This home is sure to impress!
Perfectly located with easy access to a range of Highlands' lifestyle attractions including Public Transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Newbury Primary School, Golden Sun Moth Park and more. Call now to arrange a private inspection!

Description:
SOLD BY MICHAEL MAROUGI 0488 588 890. WANTED MORE PROPERTIES
Build your dream house on 535 sqm with big wide frontage in Mt Atkin Estate
ATTENTION BUYER,S: You are eligible for $25,000 Government Grant for Building + $10,000 FHOG.
Nestled amongst some of the area's finest properties & measuring a whopping 535m2 (approx.) with its commanding stance and super-wide frontage, providing immense building options for the lucky buyer.
This home site is the perfect position to build a distinguished home that will have some of the best views to the Melbourne that you will ever see. Situated close to Craigieburn Central, Hume Highway, Craigieburn Public Golf Course, and other important amenities, this large parcel of land will suit all house types. With a limited number of blocks in this prestigious estate available, now is the time to capitalize on this wonderful opportunity.
Extra Features.
• Just 26km from Melbourne CBD
• Mt Atkin Estate has everything you need to live a convenient life
• Close to the nearby Craigieburn Central
• Easy access to the city and Melbourne airport
• Close to parklands, playgrounds, cinema, and reserve
• Close to primary schools and secondary school. Choose from public and private schools such as the popular Aitken Hill Primary School or the highly respected Hume Anglican Grammar School.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
To secure this great opportunity with lots of potentials, Contact: KALLEY SINGH 0433 927 573
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:

Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD !! 5 Active buyers still looking !
This single-level quality home is ideal for first-time buyers or perfect investment opportunity with its free-flowing design, a long list of features & low-maintenance surrounds. You will be impressed by your first step into this three-bedroom home which has been masterfully appointed with classy and stylish fixtures and fittings throughout.
The home's inviting interior comprises 3 spacious bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe), Every room filled with natural light, stylish ensuite & main central bathroom - both with floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a versatile open-plan huge living area adjoining dining area accompanied by a sleek stone-bench kitchen with tiled, stainless steel appliances, heating, split system, outdoor entertaining area, landscaped backyard gardens to both the front and rear yards and double lock-up garage.--
* High square-set ceilings throughout
* Spacious Laundry and lots of storage
* Public Transport Short Drive away
* Easy access onto the Freeway & Local Schools
* Minutes away from the Upcoming Business Center & all the amenities--
This is a rare gem that ticks all the boxes of modern, low maintenance living with room for the entire family. Inspect today and you will not be disappointed.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
